Package: org.weceem.binding

[Groovy] Class ExtendedDateAndTimeDateEditor

        • org.weceem.binding.ExtendedDateAndTimeDateEditor
        • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
          org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.binding.StructuredPropertyEditor

          class ExtendedDateAndTimeDateEditor
extends org.springframework.beans.propertyeditors.CustomDateEditor

          Variant of DateAndTimeDateEditor supporting a variety of date formats. Note: I don't consider this implementation good practice, but the html5 implementations of how clients send date formats are really weird.
